title: BARD - Live From The Carolla Drinks BBQ
itunes:title: BARD - Live From The Carolla Drinks BBQ
description:
Adam, Mark & Dr. Drew step away from the fun of the Carolla Drinks BBQ to bring you a Saturday BARD with memories from back when and analysis of current events from today. Enjoy!

Watch Beyond A Reasonable Doubt on YouTube at YouTube.com/ReasonableDoubtPodcast and subscribe while you're there.
